# xformTarget

**Article**

A prim that provides the transform to which this action animates.

## Overview

To provide a transform, assign an [https://openusd.org/docs/api/class_usd_geom_xformable.html] prim to this property.

The prims in the list of [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/affectedobjects] animate from their current transform to the transform that this prim specifies. Include in the prim the transformational operations that implement the transform animation. For more information, see [https://openusd.org/docs/api/class_usd_geom_xform_op.html].

### Declaration

```other
rel xformTarget
```

## Properties

- **info:id**: The action’s unique identifier.
- **affectedObjects**: A list of prims that respond to the notification.
- **duration**: The amount of time that the objects face the camera.
- **type**: An option that controls the order in which the actions execute.
- **easeType**: An option that describes the animation’s change in pace over time.
